Lio crushes the disk"Thats who I was this is who I am now we live in the 
present and future is decided here now by the choices we make and for old 
times sake its the end of the road Dark Convoy. And what kinda name is Drago 
I'll try it with eggrolls."

Dark Convoy "Ships return to orbit and wait my signal I hope you other 
brother is a lot smarter than you. A proverb I hate those shits you always 
speak now its pay back for the eye. But here is one for you Rose are red and 
Violets are blue I hope maximals can reassemble you because when I'm through 
there will be nothing left of you."

Lio looks "Cute you write your own stuff."

Dark Convoy shoulder rush Lio into a tree cracking the tree "By the blessings 
Dark star I change." Dark Convoy transforms in to A robot that looks like Lio 
only a foot taller and his armor is black and blue.
